summary: Verified that 'account_manager' role has been replaced with 'sales_manager' across backend and frontend. Sales Funnel UI with two-column layout is working correctly.

Layout.js SALES_ROLES_NAV correctly includes 'sales_manager' instead of 'account_manager'
SalesFunnelOnboarding.js implements two-column layout with left sidebar steps and right content area
Progress indicator shows 'X of 9' at top right as expected
Completed steps show green checkmarks, current step has blue highlighting

success_rate.frontend: 100% - All UI elements verified via Playwright

context_for_next_testing_agent: All sales_manager role changes verified. Sales Funnel UI has two-column layout working correctly. Lead access is permission-based - dp@dvbc.com may not have access to all leads.
